in an opposite way: Poor health is accepted as an attribute of normal ageing. Conversely, youth is depicted as a time of vitality and good health. The staff of any organisation are its best ambassadors or conversely may be its worst. See
converse

Conversely, people who search in their careers for stability and structure acquire these values in their childhood.
